org.jetel.mapping.filter

Interface MappingFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MappingFilterAdapter, SourceCloverMappingFilter, SourceErrorMappingFilter, TargetCloverMappingFilter, TargetPortMappingFilter

    public interface MappingFilter
    The mapping filter interface can be used in Mapping.subMapping() method to filter out the unnecessary mapping assignments.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkAssignment(MappingAssignment assignment)
      This method validates a mapping assignment.
      boolean checkSource(MappingSource source)
      This method validates a mapping source.
      boolean checkTarget(MappingTarget target)
      This method validates a mapping target.

    • Method Detail

      • checkAssignment

        boolean checkAssignment(MappingAssignment assignment)
        This method validates a mapping assignment.
        Parameters:
        assignment - a checked mapping assignment
        Returns:
        false if the assignment should be filtred out, else true

      • checkSource

        boolean checkSource(MappingSource source)
        This method validates a mapping source.
        Parameters:
        source - a checked mapping source
        Returns:
        false if the assignment with the given mapping source should be filtred out, else true

      • checkTarget

        boolean checkTarget(MappingTarget target)
        This method validates a mapping target.
        Parameters:
        target - a checked mapping target
        Returns:
        false if the assignment with the given mapping target should be filtred out, else true
